stripped_text: +2 mu When you install this hardware, place 3 power counters on it. The first time each turn you make a successful run, place 1 power counter on this hardware. 2 hosted power counters: Break up to 2 subroutines. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +2[mu] When you install this hardware, place 3 power counters on it. The first time each turn you make a successful run, place 1 power counter on this hardware. 2 hosted power counters: Break up to 2 subroutines. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Endurance
